parameters.content:
## Step 1
Login to n8n, and get the tags we have for our personal owned projects

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
## Step 2
Extract the tags as a json string, and format this into a suitable format for our response form for user to select the tags they want to work with

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
## Step 3
Extract the form details and loop over each tag to process

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note3

parameters.content:
## Step 3
We search for the folders and filter based on the number of folders found

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note4

parameters.content:
## Step 4 a) 
If more than 1 folder is found, we dedupe the tags and limit to one, then use that as the folder

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note5

parameters.content:
## Step 4 b) 
If no folder is found, we create a new folder

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note6

parameters.content:
## Step 5

Merge the paths so we use one workflow

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note7

parameters.content:
## Step 6
Get the workflows and move them to the respective folders

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note8

parameters.content:
## Step 7
Respond with a success message

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Set Workflow

## Overview
Automated workflow: Set Workflow. This workflow integrates 14 different services: filter, httpRequest, formTrigger, stickyNote, code. It contains 52 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 52
- **Node Types**: 14
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **set credentials**: set
- **login n8n**: httpRequest
- **get tags**: httpRequest
- **my-projects**: httpRequest
- **Split Out**: splitOut
- **filter owned projects**: filter
- **Get folders**: httpRequest
- **Split Out2**: splitOut
- **Remove Duplicates**: removeDuplicates
- **Loop Over Items**: splitInBatches
- ... and 42 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
